Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]I wonder how the code got that scrambled...

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]It almost seems like it was sabotaged.

Name: [color=green]Molfi
Text: [color=black]That's a serious accusation. If you suspect someone of sabotage, you'd better check the security tapes before accusing someone.
